name: Dia de Los Muertos (Day of The Dead)
name_original: Dia de Los Muertos (Day of The Dead)
description:
Dia de Los Muertos is a Beat Em' Up game, in which the player fights zombies on the Day of The dead holiday while being educated about the real-life aspects of the holiday. 

This game was made over the course of 4 months for an Alternate Game Development class at the University of Utah. It was made by Gabriel Garcia, Cameron Knight, Paulina Larkin, and Sara Yi. 

Controls:

This game supports keyboard controls and Xbox Controllers (xinput).

  • Move: WASD / Left Joystick
  • Jump: Space Bar / A button 
  • Punch Attack: J / X Button 
  • Charge Guitar Attack: Hold L / Hold the RT Trigger 
  • Throw Bottle (Once picked up): K / Left Trigger
